PROPERTY_DATA.VALUE: KNORR CHICKEN POWDER SEASONING 家乐鸡粉调味料
CN_CON_ON PACK REF[1]: CON On-Pack Reference Spec CN

TEXT_DATA.TEXT: Lable and Consumer Information for Knorr Chicken Powder 60g
A universal seasoning for stir-fry, marinate, soup and noodle base

Nutrition per 100g as prepared and on pack nutrition information per 100g as sold were calculated based on RDC data . In China, GDA% is equivalent to NRV% which is mandatorily required by China Nutrition Labeling regulation law.

食用盐，麦芽糊精，味精，淀粉，鸡肉粉，白砂糖，酵母抽提物，食用鸡油（鸡油，丁基羟基茴香醚，二丁基羟基甲苯），植物油，食用香精，酱油调味粉(酿造酱油，麦芽糊精，食用盐，焦糖色，琥珀酸二钠，5'-呈味核苷酸二钠，L-丙氨酸)，5'-呈味核苷酸二钠，5'-肌苷酸二钠，白胡椒粉 Salt, Maltodextrin, MSG, Cornstarch, Chicken meat powder, Sugar, Yeast extract, Edible chicken fat(Cicken fat, BHA , BHT) , Vegetable oil, Flavoring, Soysauce powder(Soy sauce, Maltodextrin, Salt, Caramel, Disodium succinate ,I+G, L-Ala), I+G, IMP, White pepper
Store in cool, dry place. Seal the plastic lid after opening, keep away from moisture to ensure best flavor.If the product is not being used for a long time, seal and store in refrigerator.

REF_TEXT_DATA.description: Risk of Cross Contamination during Processing
REF_TEXT_DATA.TEXT: Information captured in the following property groups relates to the total allergen status of a product i.e. allergens inherent in the underlying ingredient composition of the product in addition to those due to cross contamination during processing of the product and which impact on final product labelling
